The Persecution of them people they call Quakers in several places in Lanchashire Holme, Thomas, d. 1695. Fell, Leonard, 1624-1700 or 1701. Addamson, William, 17th cent.
[1], 15 p.
Printed for Giles Calvert ..., London : 1656.
Caption title. Written by Leonard Fell, Thomas Holme and other Friends. Wing attributes authorship to William Addamson. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
